name: pair-headset
description: Check that an headset can be paired.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth technology is enabled on the test device 
- The Headset is charged and powered on

steps.description: Press the discovery button to make the headset device visible
steps.expected: Blue led  of the headset blinks

steps.description: Click on 'Set up a New Device'
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard appears and searching for devices. Available Bluetooth devices appears

steps.description: Click on the headset device to pair
Click on the 'Continue' button and wait a moment
steps.expected: Bluetooth wizard displays 'Successfully set up new device <device name>'. The added device appears in the menu of Bluetooth applet. The added device appears in the Devices field of Bluetooth panel.

author: zingile

name: sound-headset
objective: Earphone of the Bluetooth headset is functional
description: When the headset is paired, it should be possible to listen to songs and music with the headset.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth is enabled on the target device
- The headset is paired and connected

steps.expected: Menu of the headset device appears
Sound panel opens and the headset device is listed in the 'Output tab'

steps.description: Select the headset device in the 'Output tab'
Click on the 'Sound Effects' tab and click on the samples
steps.expected: You can hear the sound in the headset device

author: zingile

name: mic-headset
objective: Microphone of the Bluetooth headset is functional
description: When the headset is paired, it should be possible to use the microphone of the headset.
pre_condition:
- Bluetooth is enabled on the target device
- The headset is paired and connected

steps.expected: Menu of the headset device appears
Sound panel opens and the headset device is listed in the 'Output tab'

steps.description: Click on the 'Input' tab, ensure the 'Input volume switcher is toggled on 'ON', select the headset device
steps.expected: 'Input' tab opens. The headset device is highlighted

steps.description: Speak in the microphone of the headset
steps.expected: Bar of the 'Input level' should move

author: zingile
